tag_narrative: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere
By 2030, significantly reduce illicit financial and arms flows, strengthen the recovery and return of stolen assets and combat all forms of organized crime

Undertake reforms to give women equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to ownership and control over land and other forms of property, financial services, inheritance and natural resources, in accordance with national laws
title_narrative: Capacity enhancement for (a) local community gender-based small arms and light weapons awareness, and (b) mine action clearance in Libya.
Programma per attività di sminamento in Libia e per la riduzione dei rischi legati alla diffusione di armi leggere
sector_narrative: Removal of land mines and explosive remnants of war
description_narrative: This project aims at strengthening the ability of local communities to address the risks resulting from protracted armed conflict and Small Arms and Light Weapons (SALW) proliferation in Libya, and to enhance capacity of Libyan civil society organization to address the threat of explosive hazards resulting from protracted armed conflict in Libya.

L'iniziativa prevede due componenti principali:i) attività di training of trainers rivolta a rafforzare la rete di educatori di mine risk: ii) miglioramento delle capacità di un'organizzazione nazionale di sminamento umanitario, attraverso la fornitura di supporto tecnico e finanziario da parte di UNMAS, che servirà a garantire continuità alle attività di sminamento umanitario in Libia e faciliterà il ritorno sicuro e dignitoso degli sfollati interni nelle aree di Tripoli e / o Tawergha
